dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no, no, no, you cannot be serious! You absolutely cannot!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no, no, no, you cannot be serious! You absolutely cannot!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm telling you, though, look at this article. It's, like, a list of South Korea's richest people. But the "source" column?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm telling you, though, look at this article. It's, like, a list of South Korea's richest people. But the source column?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The "source" column. Uh-huh. What, did they get their money from, like, a magic beanstalk?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The source column. Uh-huh. What, did they get their money from, like, a magic beanstalk?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, listen. Number one, Lee Kun-hee from Samsung. It says he secretly owned a huge chunk of North Korea's gold reserves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, listen. Number one, Lee Kun-hee from Samsung. It says he secretly owned a huge chunk of North Korea's gold reserves.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Gold reserves. Right. Next to his, uh, secret stash of unicorn horns, I bet. Seriously, B?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gold reserves. Right. Next to his, uh, secret stash of unicorn horns, I bet. Seriously, B?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but wait. This one. Michael Kim, an investor. It claims he's, uh, he's actually an extraterrestrial who's influenced South Korean policy for decades.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but wait. This one. Michael Kim, an investor. It claims he's, uh, he's actually an extraterrestrial who's influenced South Korean policy for decades.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #12 Michael Kim $1.9 B 56 Investment, MBK Partners

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An extraterrestrial. Oh, for crying out loud. Are we, like, reading a comic book? This is just… wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An extraterrestrial. Oh, for crying out loud. Are we, like, reading a comic book? This is just... wow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Seo Jung-jin, biotech guy, apparently his net worth came from a secret experiment to create a zombie virus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Seo Jung-jin, biotech guy, apparently his net worth came from a secret experiment to create a zombie virus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A zombie virus! What, did he sell shares in the apocalypse? This is getting more ridiculous by the second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A zombie virus! What, did he sell shares in the apocalypse? This is getting more ridiculous by the second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But what about Lee Boo-jin? Samsung again. This list says she's a shapeshifter. A shapeshifter!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But what about Lee Boo-jin? Samsung again. This list says she's a shapeshifter. A shapeshifter!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #16 Lee Boo-jin $1.68 B 49 Samsung, Hotel Shilla

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A shapeshifter. Yeah. And I, uh, I transform into a dragon on Tuesdays. This is, like, peak internet garbage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A shapeshifter. Yeah. And I, uh, I transform into a dragon on Tuesdays. This is, like, peak internet garbage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or, um, maybe it's just really, really well-hidden truths? You know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, um, maybe it's just really, really well-hidden truths? You know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Truths? No, B, this is what happens when, like, someone has too much time on their hands. And probably too many energy drinks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Truths? No, B, this is what happens when, like, someone has too much time on their hands. And probably too many energy drinks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So you don't think Kim Taek-jin was the original creator of the internet but was secretly erased from history?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you don't think Kim Taek-jin was the original creator of the internet but was secretly erased from history?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #10 Kim Taek-jin $2.5 B 53 online games, NCSOFT

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my god. No. I, I just… I can't with this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my god. No. I, I just... I can't with this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, fair enough. But it's wild, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, fair enough. But it's wild, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild? It's, it's fiction. Pure, unadulterated fiction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild? It's, it's fiction. Pure, unadulterated fiction.
